text: Bernard Bocquet (born 24 March 1949) is a former French cyclist. He competed in the team pursuit event at the 1972 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:French male cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of France Category:Cyclists at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:People from Meudon Category:French track cyclists Category:Sportspeople from Hauts-de-Seine
title: Bernard Bocquet
